entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content:
• My name is Yuan Chen, a graduate student of Statistics in The George Washington University. I’m currently looking for a summer research position in statistics, applied mathematics and related areas.
  • I am working on a-prior error estimate of full discrete Partially Penalized Immersed Finite Element method for Elastodynamics interface problem with Dr. Xu Zhang.
  • In the past two years, I worked on Immersed Finite Element method for Elliptic interface problems with multi-domain and triple junction points, environmental flow dynamics and statistical analysis on sustainability.
  • Please see Research and CV for more information about my research, if you are interested in these topics, feel free to contact me to have a discussion!
  • Homepage theme is stemmed from ‘The Legend of Zelda’, my favorite console game designed by Nintendo.
